trans-unit.source: Represents a hidden field used to store a non-displayed value.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于存储非显示值的隐藏的字段。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The HiddenField control is used to store a value that needs to be persisted across posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 简介 HiddenField 控件用于存储一个值，需要发往服务器之间得以保持。

trans-unit.source: It is rendered as an `<input type= "hidden"/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 呈现为`<input type= "hidden"/>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Normally view state, session state, and cookies are used to maintain the state of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态、 会话状态和 cookie 通常使用，以维持的状态的 Web 窗体页。

trans-unit.source: However, if these methods are disabled or are not available, you can use the HiddenField control to store state values.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果这些方法已禁用或不可用，你可以使用 HiddenField 控件来存储状态的值。

trans-unit.source: To specify the value for a HiddenField control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定 HiddenField 控件的值，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can provide a routine that gets called every time the value of the HiddenField control changes between posts to the server by creating an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以提供每次两次发送到服务器创建的事件处理程序之间更改 HiddenField 控件的值会被调用的例程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref> object used to indicate that child controls are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref>用于指示不允许使用子控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is normally used to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> object for storing the child controls of a Web Server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法通常用于创建<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>用于存储 Web 服务器控件的子控件的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this implementation of the method, an <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> collection is always returned to indicate that child controls are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 在此实现中的方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>始终返回集合以指示不允许使用子控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将主题应用到该控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控件不支持主题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性已被重写以始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set this property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置此属性，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that this control does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>以指示此控件不支持主题。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to this control.
trans-unit.target: 设置输入到此控件的焦点。

trans-unit.source: Setting focus to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控件不支持。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown if you attempt to call this method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotSupportedException>如果你尝试调用此方法引发。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 尝试调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 进程回发数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Web Forms page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` to this method call, then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> on those controls.
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体页框架跟踪返回的所有服务器控件`true`到此方法调用，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>这些控件上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有传入名称值的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> control's state changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref>控件的状态发生更改，导致回发; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged>引发事件时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制发往服务器之间的更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnValueChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnValueChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref>控制已更改。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> class to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>类用于通知 ASP.NET 应用程序的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制已更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的客户端的浏览器到 Web 服务器控件内容呈现<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Render 方法用于呈现客户端的浏览器使用指定的服务器控件内容<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>用于呈现服务器控件内容在客户端的浏览器上的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控件不支持主题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 重写此属性，以始终返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set this property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置此属性，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always returns an empty string ("") to indicate that themes are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回空字符串 ("") 以指示不支持主题。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有传入名称值的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server control's state changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果回发导致服务器控件的状态发生更改，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的隐藏字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the Value property to specify or determine the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Value 属性来指定或确定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: The value of the hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏字段的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref>控制发往服务器之间的更改。

trans-unit.source: The ValueChanged event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将引发 ValueChanged 事件时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制发往服务器之间的更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。
